meanings.sent1: My flashlight is rechargeable, so I can use it many times.
meanings.sent2: The rechargeable phone lasts longer than the disposable one.
meanings.sent3: I wish my energy was rechargeable like my phone battery.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a rechargeable light, always brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The rechargeable car zoomed silently down the road, powered by stored energy.

meanings.definition: A device or battery that can be charged again.
meanings.sent1: I always carry a rechargeable in my bag for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The remote control uses a rechargeable to function.
meanings.sent3: The rechargeable in my camera decided to take a break right before the perfect shot.
meanings.sent4: His brain felt like a rechargeable, needing a boost of coffee to start the day.
meanings.sent5: The rechargeable for the toy robot was missing, so it sat still and silent.
